name: Where'sMyDroid
0:
”Alexa, open Where's My Droid.”
”Alexa, ask Where's My Droid to make my phone ring.”
”Alexa, ask Where's My Droid to locate my phone.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: where's my droid
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Use the original phone tracking app to find your phone. You can have Alexa make your phone ring on full volume or track it with the phones GPS.

Setup:
First you'll need to download the Where's My Droid app on your phone from Google Play. Run the app and setup a Commander account. You'll then log into that Commander account through the Alexa app to link your account.
